Looks great! Thanks so much

Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

please think of the environment before you print this email

'Feed Me' menu

Decision fatigue? We hear you!
Introducing our 'Feed Me' $69pp menu, a great value tasting menu designed to be fresh, uncomplicated and deliciously filling. We've done the hard work for you, so simply grab a date (or two!) and enjoy Australian seafood the love.fish way…
Available any day, lunch or dinner, for 2 more guests. No preorder necessary. Book here.

Celebrate the End of the Financial Year 2025 and book your function with us.

With direct Sydney harbour views, our Barangaroo restaurant can host lunch and dinner events, accommodating parties from 8 to 125 guests outside and 28 guests inside. Plus, private dining room coming 1st of May!

Group catering for corporate bookings costs $85 for two courses, $89 for three courses or $99 for a selection menu. We also offer 2-3 hour drinks packages starting from $65.

View our functions pack here to see why love.fish is the perfect venue for your EOFY event!

Or for group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

Hi Michelle,

Thanks!

We have now updated the site and no code were removed

https://www.lovefish.com.au/

Hi Joel, jumping in here.

That's way over our tech capabilities, sorry no idea!

You guys did our full migration to wordpress and are the only people to have added google reviews and insta so I will leave that to you to decide.

Kindest,

Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

Hi Hana,

I hope all is well.

Just jumping on behalf of Rica and Cindy

We’re currently reviewing the setup, there is a script compatibility issue between GTM and the Elfsight widgets (Google Reviews and Instagram).

Could you please confirm if the GTM codes attached are still in use? Alternatively, are you okay with us removing them if they’re no longer needed?

Hi Hana,

We’re currently reviewing the setup due to a script compatibility issue between GTM and the Elfsight widgets (Google Reviews and Instagram).

Could you please confirm if the GTM codes attached are still in use? Alternatively, are you okay with us removing them if they’re no longer needed?

Hi Hana!

We're currently looking into this issue and we'll let you know as soon as we're able to display both Instagram Feed and Google Reviews.

We'll surely reach out if we have questions.

Thank you for being patient.

Good morning, just following up my last email.

If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Kindest regards,

Hana

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Good afternoon team,
Hope you are having a lovely week so far.


-Could you please change our pop up window from the Feed me menu, to the following? Please keep the same photo as for Feed me.


Easter Long Weekend
Nothing says Easter quite like Australian Seafood. Throw in a side of Harbour views and warm, approachable dining and the perfect Easter celebration awaits! At love.fish there is no set menu requirement, simply a $75pp minimum spend on food and beverages. Children under 12 have a $30 min spend, with a children's menu available.
Your Easter, Spent Your Way... Book now here.


-Can you also add the Easter into our events drop down? Once you hit Event, drop down should show Book and Event and then Easter straight under. If you have something from last year's Easter, feel free to re-use it.



-Our Google feed have disappeared as well as our Instagram feed from the bottom of the page. Can you look into it please?


Looking forward to hearing from you.




If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Kindest regards,

Hana
